00021 class CIMDParserResult {
00022    public:
00025       enum result_t {
00026          RESP_LOGIN,
00027          RESP_SUBMIT,
00028          RESP_DELIVERY,
00029          MESSAGE_DELIVERY,
00030          RESP_NACK,
00031          RESP_ALIVE_ACK,
00032          RESP_ERROR = 900, // Special case: RESP_ERROR can be embedded in 
00033                            // another type of message.
00034          RESP_ERROR_TXT = 901,
00035          NO_MATCH 
00036       };
00037
